analyzed: shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de /
translated: introspection, proper mental activity, and the eight liberations.

original: brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight?

original: gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong @89a *//
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong @89a *//
translated: Having form, one sees forms.

original: ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o //
analyzed: ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o //
translated: This is the first liberation.🔽Having the notion of internal form, one sees external forms.

original: nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o //🔽sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o // sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o //
translated: This is the second liberation.🔽Having transcended all notions of form,

original: de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes kyang yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes kyang yang dag par 'das te /
translated: one perceives the sphere of infinite space.

original: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
analyzed: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
translated: The perception of obstruction disappears,

original: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
translated: and since one does not pay attention to the perception of variety, one thinks, “Space is infinite.”

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o //
translated: Thus, one achieves and abides in the base of infinite space. This is the fourth liberation.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: “In every way, one completely transcends the base of infinite space,

original: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o //
translated: thinking, ‘Consciousness is infinite.’ Thus, one achieves and abides in the base of infinite consciousness. This is the fifth liberation.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: “In every way, one completely transcends the base of infinite consciousness,

original: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o //
analyzed: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o //
translated: thinking, ‘There is nothing at all.’ Thus, one achieves and abides in the base of nothing whatsoever. This is the sixth liberation.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: Having completely transcended the sphere of nothing-whatsoever,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o //
translated: he abides in the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception. This is the seventh liberation.

original: de rnam pa thams cad 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: Having completely transcended the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception,

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba @89b 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba @89b 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o //
translated: he abides in the cessation of perception and feeling. This is the eighth liberation.🔽These are the eight liberations.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste /
translated: There are nine serial absorptions.

original: dgu gang zhe na /
analyzed: dgu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the nine?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: de 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: de 'dod pas dben /
translated: He is detached from sense objects,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: detached from unwholesome and non-virtuous things,

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: with thought and examination,

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: he abides in the first concentration, which is born of detachment and filled with joy and bliss.

original: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas /
analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas /
translated: Having pacified conceptualization and analysis,

original: nang yongs su dang ste /
analyzed: nang yongs su dang ste /
translated: he becomes inwardly clear,

original: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa /
translated: and his mind becomes one-pointed.

original: rnam par dpyod pa med pa /
analyzed: rnam par dpyod pa med pa /
translated: Without conceptualization and analysis,🔽he attains and dwells in the second concentration, which is free of conceptualization and analysis and is accompanied by the joy and bliss born of meditative stabilization.🔽“Free of desire” means free of the desire of the desire realm.🔽“Free of conceptualization and analysis” means free of the conceptualization and analysis of the desire realm.

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te /
translated: “Free of joy” means free of the joy of the first concentration.

original: bde ba lus kyis myong la /🔽'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bde ba lus kyis myong la / 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /
translated: “Free of suffering” means free of the suffering of the desire realm.🔽“Free of pleasure” means free of the pleasure of the first and second concentrations.🔽“Free of mental pain” means free of the mental pain of the desire realm.🔽“Free of happiness” means free of the happiness of the desire realm and the first concentration.

original: bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o //🔽zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o // zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: “Free of unhappiness” means free of the unhappiness of the desire realm.🔽“Free of equanimity” means free of the equanimity of the desire realm and the first two concentrations.🔽“Free of mindfulness” means free of the mindfulness of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.

original: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de bde ba'ang spangs /
analyzed: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de bde ba'ang spangs /
translated: “Free of discernment” means free of the discernment of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.🔽“Free of the body” means free of the body of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.🔽“Free of the mind” means free of the mind of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.

original: sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /
translated: “Free of the afflictions” means free of the afflictions of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.🔽“Free of the aggregates” means free of the five aggregates of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.🔽“Free of the elements” means free of the elements of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.🔽“Free of the sense spheres” means free of the sense spheres of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.🔽“Free of the world” means free of the world of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.🔽“Free of the world of beings” means free of the world of beings of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.🔽“Free of the world of life” means free of the world of life of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.

original: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
analyzed: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
translated: “Free of the world of birth” means free of the world of birth of the desire realm and the first three concentrations.🔽“Free of the world of

original: bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa /
analyzed: bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa /
translated: It is neither pleasant nor unpleasant.🔽

original: btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de rnam pa thams @90a *//
analyzed: btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de rnam pa thams @90a *//
translated: He then enters and remains in the fourth meditative concentration, which is neither pleasurable nor painful and is purified of mental joy and anguish.

original: cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: He completely transcends perceptions of form and,

original: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
analyzed: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
translated: with the disappearance of perceptions of obstruction,

original: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /🔽nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: he does not pay attention to perceptions of diversity, thinking, ‘Space is infinite.’🔽He thus enters and remains in the meditative concentration of the sense field of infinite space.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: He completely transcends the meditative concentration of the sense field of infinite space and,

original: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: thinking, ‘Consciousness is infinite,’ he enters and remains in the meditative concentration of the sense field of infinite consciousness.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: He completely transcends the meditative concentration of the sense field of infinite consciousness and,

original: cung zad ma yod do zhes /
analyzed: cung zad ma yod do zhes /
translated: thinking, ‘There is nothing whatsoever,’🔽he enters and remains in the meditative concentration of the sense field of nothing whatsoever.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He establishes and abides in the sphere of nothingness.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: He completely transcends the sphere of nothingness

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and establishes and abides in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: He completely transcends the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and establishes and abides in the cessation of perception and feeling.🔽Thus, with regard to these nine serial absorptions,🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness,

original: de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las @90b 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dong ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las @90b 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dong ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless, the emptiness of nonrepudiation,🔽the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
translated: They are the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four forms of fearlessness, the four forms of precise knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o //
translated: Those are called supramundane dharmas.

original: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: rab 'byor / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, dharmas with outflows are

analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: these:

translated: the five aggregates, the twelve sense fields, the eighteen constituents, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and the five superknowledges.

analyzed: de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o //
translated: Those are called dharmas with outflows.”

translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

analyzed: zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

translated: these:

original: stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the five powers, the seven factors of awakening, the eightfold noble path, the four noble truths, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /

original: de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o //
translated: These are called uncontaminated dharmas.🔽Subhūti said,

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: rab 'byor / 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Subhūti, conditioned dharmas are

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang / dran pa nya bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang / dran pa nya bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
translated: the desire realm, the form realm, the formless realm, and other dharmas included in the conditioned realms, the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms @91b par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms @91b par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
translated: the four formless absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the five kinds of supernormal knowledge,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: the six transcendent perfections, all the aspects of emptiness, all the aspects of meditative absorption, all the aspects of the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four kinds of intrepid confidence, the four kinds of precise knowledge,

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
translated: great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o //
translated: These are called conditioned phenomena.🔽”

original: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He asked, “Blessed One,

original: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags /
translated: what are unconditioned phenomena?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Noble son, unconditioned phenomena are the following:

original: rab 'byor / 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Subhūti, unconditioned phenomena

original: gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste /
analyzed: gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste /
translated: are those that do not arise, do not disintegrate, and do not change into something else.

original: 'dod chags zad pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags zad pa /
translated: the exhaustion of desire,

original: zhe sdang zad pa /
analyzed: zhe sdang zad pa /
translated: the exhaustion of hatred,

original: gti mug zad pa /
analyzed: gti mug zad pa /
translated: the exhaustion of delusion,

original: de bzhin nyid /🔽ma nor ba de bzhin nyid /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid /
translated: suchness,🔽unmistaken suchness,

original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid /🔽chos nyid / chos kyi dbyings /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid / chos nyid / chos kyi dbyings /
translated: unchanging suchness,

original: chos skyon med pa nyid /
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid /
translated: the true nature of dharmas, the dharma-constituent,🔽the establishment of dharmas,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings /
translated: the inconceivable realm,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
translated: and the very limit of reality.

original: rab 'byor / de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, these are called unconditioned phenomena.🔽” The Lord having said that,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti asked, “Lord,

original: thun mong gi chos gang lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: thun mong gi chos gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: what are the common phenomena?

original: rab 'byor / thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni /🔽bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / @92a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / @92a *//
translated: ” The Lord said, “Subhūti, the common phenomena🔽are the four concentrations, the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste /
translated: and the four formless absorptions.

original: de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o //
translated: These are called the qualities shared in common with ordinary beings.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: thun mong ma lags pa'i chos zhes bya ba gang lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: thun mong ma lags pa'i chos zhes bya ba gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: what are the qualities that are not shared in common?”

original: rab 'byor / thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti, the qualities that are not shared in common are🔽the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven aspects of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: the four noble truths, the eight liberations, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, and all the meditative stabilities and dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o //
translated: These are called the uncommon qualities.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Therein, the bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: who practices the perfection of wisdom

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags par mi bya'o //🔽chos thams @92b cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags par mi bya'o // chos thams @92b cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing /
translated: should not be attached to any phenomena that are empty of their own marks.🔽All phenomena should be understood to be nonconceptual and nondual.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: They are nonconceptual and nondual because they are nonconceptual and nondual.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhuti: No, Lord.

original: gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du /
analyzed: gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du /
translated: Why is it that the Bodhisattva, the great being, is called a 'Bodhisattva'?🔽The Lord: Because he has set out for the knowledge of all modes, therefore he is called a 'Bodhisattva'.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Subhuti: What is the great mass of beings for whose sake the Bodhisattva, the great being, has set out to win full enlightenment?

original: rab 'byor / sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas /
translated: The Lord: The great mass of beings is a designation for the five grasping skandhas.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul /
translated: Therefore he is called a 'Bodhisattva, a great being'.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Subhuti: What is the great mass of beings for whose sake the Bodhisattva, the great being, has set out to win full enlightenment?

original: rab 'byor / sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Lord: The great mass of beings is a designation for the five grasping skandhas.

original: rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas /
analyzed: rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas /
translated: the stage of lineage, the eighth stage, the stage of stream-enterer, the stage of once-returner, the stage of non-returner, the stage of worthy one, the stage of pratyekabuddha, the bodhisattva who has generated the initial thought of enlightenment,

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste /
translated: up to the bodhisattva great being who is on the irreversible stage.

original: rab 'byor / de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, that is called the definite mass of beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattva great being will become the foremost of that.

original: de la byang chub @93a sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de /
analyzed: de la byang chub @93a sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de /
translated: There, the bodhisattva great being should generate the vajra-like thought,

original: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o //
translated: which is called the foremost of the great mass of beings.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Bhagavān,

original: rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags /
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags /
translated: what is the vajra-like thought?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
translated: Subhuti: Here a Bodhisattva, a great being, should produce the thought:

original: 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o //
translated: “For the sake of all beings I will don the armour for immeasurable saṃsāra.

original: bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o //
translated: I will give up all that I have.

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o //🔽bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o // bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
translated: I will generate the thought of sameness towards all beings.🔽I will lead all beings to Nirvāṇa through the three vehicles.

original: de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /
analyzed: de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /
translated: And even though I will lead all beings to Nirvāṇa,

original: sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas /
analyzed: sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas /
translated: no being at all will have been led to Nirvāṇa.

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o //
translated: I will know all dharmas as non-arisen and unceasing.

original: bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o //
translated: With the thought of the knowledge of all modes, which is not shared by any of the Disciples or Pratyekabuddhas, I will course in the six perfections.

original: bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: I should train in the perfection of the complete attainment of all the realizations of the Dharma.

original: bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: I should understand the accomplishment of the Dharma in a single way.🔽I should train in the accomplishment of all the immeasurable Dharmas.

original: bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o //🔽snyam du @93b sems bskyed de /
analyzed: bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o // snyam du @93b sems bskyed de /
translated: I must train in accomplishing all the immeasurable Dharmas.🔽”🔽

original: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste /
translated: Subhūti, this is the bodhisattva great beings’ vajra-like production of the thought,

original: de la gnas shing /
analyzed: de la gnas shing /
translated: standing in which

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings, with the method of not apprehending anything, do the great deed of a great being for the great mass of beings.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings should produce the thought

original: sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor pa nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o //🔽snyam du sems bskyed de /🔽de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor pa nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o // snyam du sems bskyed de / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: I will experience all the feelings of suffering experienced by sentient beings in the hells, by sentient beings in the animal realm, and by sentient beings in the world of Yama, the lord of death, for the sake of those sentient beings.

original: gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste /🔽bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du /🔽sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang /
analyzed: gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste / bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang /
translated: And he should arouse the following thought:🔽“For the sake of each and every sentient being, I will experience the sufferings of the hells for many hundreds of thousands of millions of eons,

original: bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o /
analyzed: bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o /
translated: until all sentient beings have been liberated from the hells,🔽and until they have attained the bliss of the Buddhas.

original: zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du /
analyzed: zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du /
translated: In this way, for the sake of all sentient beings,

original: sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du //
analyzed: sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du //
translated: until all sentient beings have been liberated into the expanse of nirvana without remainder,

original: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar @94a *//
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar @94a *//
translated: I will experience all those sufferings of the hells.

original: bya'o // de nas gzod pa dag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de /
analyzed: bya'o // de nas gzod pa dag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de /
translated: Then, for the sake of those very beings, I will generate the roots of virtue,

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te /
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te /
translated: and after many hundreds of thousands of quintillions of eons,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste /
translated: “Su­bhūti, this is the vajra-like generation of the thought of the great bodhisattva beings.

original: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Abiding in it, the great bodhisattva beings

original: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do //
analyzed: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do //
translated: he becomes the foremost of the great mass of beings, and he does so by way of nonapprehending.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should always, constantly, generate a great mind, a mind that will become the foremost of all beings.

original: de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should generate such a great mind.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni /
translated: “In this regard, the great mind of a bodhisattva great being is as follows.

original: sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed /
translated: From the first production of the thought of awakening onward, they do not produce a mind of desire,

original: zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed /🔽gti mug gi sems mi skyed /
analyzed: zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed / gti mug gi sems mi skyed /
translated: they do not produce a mind of anger,🔽they do not produce a mind of delusion,

original: gtso ba'i sems mi skyed /
analyzed: gtso ba'i sems mi skyed /
translated: they do not produce a mind of conceit,

original: nyan thos kyi sems mi skyed /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sems mi skyed /
translated: they do not produce a mind of the śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed pa ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed pa ste /
translated: and they do not produce a mind of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o //
translated: This is the great mind of a bodhisattva great being.

original: des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang /
analyzed: des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang /
translated: They become the foremost of all beings,

original: sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: and that great thought should not be inflated.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems @94b dang ldan par byas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems @94b dang ldan par byas te /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should have an unshakable thought.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni /
translated: Here, bodhisattva great beings’ unshakable thought

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing /
translated: is the attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste /
translated: and that should not be inflated.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o //
translated: This is bodhisattva great beings’ unshakable thought.

original: des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro //
translated: They are the best of all beings, and that is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should arouse a thought of benefit and happiness for all beings.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing /
translated: Here, bodhisattva great beings’ thought of benefit and happiness is the protection of all beings,

original: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la /
translated: and not abandoning any sentient beings,

original: des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste /
analyzed: des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste /
translated: and not conceiving of them.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te /
translated: Subhūti, this is the thought of benefit and happiness of bodhisattva great beings.

original: de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do //
analyzed: de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do //
translated: Standing in that, by way of not apprehending anything, they perform the great benefit for the mass of sentient beings.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should always want the Dharma,

original: chos la dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos la dga' bar bya'o //
translated: take delight in the Dharma,

original: chos la mos par bya'o //
analyzed: chos la mos par bya'o //
translated: have conviction in the Dharma,

original: chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o //
translated: and be dedicated to the practice of conviction in the Dharma.

original: de la chos gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the Dharma?

original: chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste /
translated: All phenomena are indivisible.

original: 'di ni chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chos zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the Dharma.

original: de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is wanting the Dharma?

original: gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste /
analyzed: gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste /
translated: It is wanting and being convinced about that Dharma.

original: 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called wanting the Dharma.

original: de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is taking delight in the Dharma?

original: gang chos de la @95a *//
analyzed: gang chos de la @95a *//
translated: “What is delighting in the Dharma?

original: dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba sta /
analyzed: dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba sta /
translated: It is delighting in and enjoying the Dharma.

original: 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called delighting in the Dharma.

original: de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is conviction in the Dharma?

original: gang chos de la yon tan du blta ba ste /
analyzed: gang chos de la yon tan du blta ba ste /
translated: It is seeing the Dharma as a good quality.

original: 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called conviction in the Dharma.

original: de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is striving in the practice of conviction in the Dharma?

original: chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste /
analyzed: chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste /
translated: It is cultivating and practicing the Dharma.

original: 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o //🔽rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o // rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: This is called striving in the practice of conviction in the Dharma.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: like that should, by way of not apprehending anything,

original: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
translated: make a great mass of beings the highest priority.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should stand in inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid la gnas /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la gnas / phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in external emptiness.🔽They abide in the emptiness of the external and the internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽They abide in the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽They abide in the emptiness beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of that which is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa gnyid la gnas /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa gnyid la gnas / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽They abide in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of non-things.🔽They abide in the emptiness of essence.

original: dngos po med @95b pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te /
analyzed: dngos po med @95b pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te /
translated: They abide in the emptiness of the essence of non-things.

original: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o //
translated: I will become the foremost of the great mass of beings.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should stand in the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas /
translated: stand in the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas /🔽dbang po rnams la gnas /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas / dbang po rnams la gnas /
translated: stand in the legs of miraculous power,🔽stand in the faculties,

original: stobs rnams la gnas /
analyzed: stobs rnams la gnas /
translated: stand in the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas /
translated: stand in the branches of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas /
translated: stand in the noble eightfold path,🔽stand in the truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams la gnas /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la gnas /
translated: stand in the concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la gnas /
translated: stand in the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams la gnas /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams la gnas /
translated: stand in the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar ba rnams la gnas /
analyzed: rnam par thar ba rnams la gnas /
translated: stand in the deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas /
translated: stand in the successive absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas /🔽mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas / mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas /
translated: they stand in the emptiness of the branches of the path,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the fruits,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the aspects,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas /🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas /
translated: they stand in the emptiness of the correct exertions,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the bases of supernatural power,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the faculties,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas /
translated: they stand in the emptiness of the branches of the path,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the fruits,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas /
translated: they stand in the emptiness of the aspects,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the correct exertions,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the bases of supernatural power,

original: byams pa chen po la gnas /🔽snying rje chen po la gnas /
analyzed: byams pa chen po la gnas / snying rje chen po la gnas /
translated: they stand in the emptiness of the faculties,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the branches of the path,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the fruits,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the aspects,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the correct exertions,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te /🔽sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te / sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o //
translated: they stand in the emptiness of the bases of supernatural power,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the faculties,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the branches of the path,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the fruits,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the aspects,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the correct exertions,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the bases of supernatural power,

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems @96a *//🔽dpa' chen po /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems @96a *// dpa' chen po / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: they stand in the emptiness of the faculties,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the branches of the path,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the fruits,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the aspects,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the correct exertions,🔽they stand in the emptiness of the bases of supernatural power,

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: they stand in the emptiness of the faculties,🔽they

original: rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of the precious mudra.

original: sengge rnam par brtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: sengge rnam par brtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of the lion’s play.🔽He abided in the samadhi of the good moon.

original: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of the glory of the moon’s victory banner.

original: chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of being superior to all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of the mudra of all phenomena.

original: spyi gtsug rnam bar lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: spyi gtsug rnam bar lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of seeing the crown of the head.

original: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of certainty in the dharmadhatu.

original: nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of the glory of the victory banner of certainty.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the vajra-like samadhi.

original: chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of the mudra of engaging with all phenomena.

original: ting nge 'dzin rgyal bo ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rgyal bo ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of abiding like the king of samadhis.

original: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of the radiance of light,

original: dpung rnam par dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: dpung rnam par dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of the arrangement of the army,

original: yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of perfect elevation,🔽the samādhi of the certainty of engaging in definitions,

original: tshig bla dvags la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: tshig bla dvags la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of engaging in the meaning of words,

original: phyogs su rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: phyogs su rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of looking in all directions,

original: phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of holding the seal,

original: nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of being without decline,

original: chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of the ocean seal of the gathering of all phenomena,

original: nam mkha' @96b rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: nam mkha' @96b rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of filling the sky,🔽the samādhi of the vajra maṇḍala,

original: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of the victory banner’s crest jewel,🔽and the samādhi of the lion’s play.

original: dbang bo'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽sengge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: dbang bo'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / sengge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of the glory of the senses.🔽He abided in the samadhi of following the stream.🔽He abided in the samadhi of the lion’s majestic posture.

original: snrel zhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: snrel zhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of the crisscross.

original: nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of abandoning afflictions.

original: rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of complete illumination.🔽He abided in the samadhi of no search.

original: gnas la brten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: gnas la brten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of no reliance on abodes.

original: sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of no mind.🔽He abided in the samadhi of the stainless lamp.

original: 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of infinite light.🔽He abided in the samadhi of light-making.

original: kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of universal illumination.

original: dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of holy purity.

original: 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samadhi of stainless light.

original: dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of delight,

original: glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽zad mi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / zad mi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of the lightning lamp,🔽the inexhaustible samādhi,

original: mi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: mi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the invincible samādhi,

original: gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of having splendor,🔽the samādhi free from exhaustion,🔽the immovable samādhi,

original: 'jig pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: 'jig pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of non-destruction,

original: nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of the lamp of the sun,

original: zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the stainless moon samādhi,

original: shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the wisdom lamp samādhi,🔽the samādhi of illuminating light,

original: @97a *// snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: @97a *// snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of making light,

original: bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of performing actions,

original: ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samādhi of the splendor of wisdom,

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: and the vajra-like samādhi.

original: sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of the mind abiding.🔽He abided in the samādhi of universal illumination.

original: rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of complete stability.🔽He abided in the samādhi of the jewel limit.

original: chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of the seal of the sublime Dharma.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of the sameness of all phenomena.

original: dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of abandoning joy.

original: chos kyi 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: chos kyi 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of the sublime Dharma.

original: rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of complete dispersal.

original: chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of discerning the words of all phenomena.🔽He abided in the samādhi of the arrangement of equal letters.

original: yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi free from letters.

original: dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of cutting off reference points.🔽He abided in the samādhi of no change.

original: rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of no aspect.

original: ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽gnas med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / gnas med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Entering the Name,🔽the samadhi called Conduct Without a Basis,

original: rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Without Cataracts,

original: spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Endowed with Conduct,

original: g-yo ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: g-yo ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Without Movement,

original: yul las rgal pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: yul las rgal pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Beyond Objects,

original: yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Accumulation of All Qualities,

original: sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Abiding Without Mind,

original: @97b dge ba'i ma tog rgyas shing bsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: @97b dge ba'i ma tog rgyas shing bsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Blossoming with the Flower of Virtue,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Endowed with the Branches of Awakening,

original: spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Infinite Eloquence,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Equal to the Unequalled,

original: chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the samadhi called Transcending All Dharmas,

original: yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of complete ascertainment.🔽He abided in the samādhi of dispelling doubt.

original: gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of no location.

original: gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of single array.

original: rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of accomplishing aspects.

original: rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of becoming one.

original: rnam pa 'dor ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam pa 'dor ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of no abandonment of aspects.

original: rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of understanding the basis of existence through realization.🔽He abided in the samādhi of engaging with words and sounds.

original: sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi free from the syllables of sound and melody.

original: sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of the blazing lamp.

original: mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of the thorough knowledge of characteristics.

original: mngon par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: mngon par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of no reference point.

original: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of the supreme aspect.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of not delighting in any happiness or suffering.

original: zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin pa la gnas /
analyzed: zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin pa la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of the inexhaustible casket.

original: gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i @98a *//🔽ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i @98a *// ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the dhāraṇī of the mind.🔽He abided in the samādhi of the elimination of all that is right and wrong.

original: 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi that pacifies all conflict and cessation.

original: mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of no conflict or harmony.

original: 'od dri ma med ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: 'od dri ma med ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the stainless light samādhi.

original: snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
