analyzed: snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of the essence.🔽He abided in the samādhi of the light of the stainless full moon.

original: glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: He abided in the samādhi of the light of lightning.

original: rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the great adornment meditative stabilization,

original: rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the everywhere light meditative stabilization,

original: ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the meditative stabilization of the sameness of meditative stabilizations,

original: rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /🔽nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the meditative stabilization endowed with the mode of being without dust and free from dust,🔽the meditative stabilization correctly set out without afflictions,

original: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the meditative stabilization correctly set out without afflictions of all those with afflictions,

original: gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the meditative stabilization striving in the non-apprehensible abode,

original: de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the meditative stabilization abiding in suchness and without mind,

original: lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the meditative stabilization of the body that correctly removes faults,

original: ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
analyzed: ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas /
translated: the meditative stabilization that becomes like space by destroying the faults of speech,

original: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
translated: He abides in the meditative stabilization that is free from attachment, free from defilement, and uncontaminated like space.

original: sems can gyi phul po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur @98b bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi phul po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur @98b bar bya'o //
translated: He becomes the foremost of the great mass of beings, the foremost of the definite, by way of non-apprehending.

original: rab 'byor / chos de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Subhūti, abiding in those dharmas, the bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas /
analyzed: sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas /
translated: becomes the foremost of the great mass of beings, the foremost of the definite.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o ////
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o ////
translated: Therefore he is called a bodhisattva mahāsattva.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nga bdun pa //
analyzed: bam po nga bdun pa //
translated: Fascicle 7

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: don gang gi slad du /
analyzed: don gang gi slad du /
translated: for what reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o //
translated: I am confident in this matter of the bodhisattva great beings.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: don gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig /
analyzed: don gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig /
translated: give rise to confidence in this matter of the bodhisattva great beings.”

original: sh'a radva ta'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a radva ta'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāradvatīputra said,

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du /
translated: “Blessed One, in order to eliminate the view of a self,

original: sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang / gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
analyzed: sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang / gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
translated: I teach the Dharma to sentient beings, in order to eliminate the view of sentient beings, the view of a life force, the view of a person, the view of a being, the view of an individual, the view of a human, the view of a human being, the view of a man, the view of a man’s body, the view of a woman, the view of a woman’s body, the view of a child, the view of a boy, the view of a girl, the view of a son, the view of a daughter, the view of a mother, the view of a father, the view of a brother, the view of a sister, the view of a friend, the view of a companion, the view of a relative, the view of a kinsman, the view of a family member, the view of a friend, the view of a foe, the view of a neutral person, the view of a monk, the view of a nun, the view of a layman, the view of a laywoman, the view of a god, the view of a nāga, the view of a yakṣa, the view of a gandharva, the view of a demigod, the view of a garuḍa, the view of an kiṃnara, the view of a mahoraga, the view of Brahmā, the view of a śramaṇa, the view of a brahmin, the view of a buddha, the view of the Dharma, the view of the Saṅgha, the view of the Buddha’s body, the view of the Dharma, the view of the Saṅgha, the view of the Buddha’s body, the view of the Dharma, the view of the Saṅgha, the view of the Buddha’s body, the view of the Dharma, the view of the Saṅgha, the view of the Buddha’s body, the view of the Dharma, the view of the Saṅgha, the view of the Buddha’s body, the view of the Dharma, the view of the Saṅgha, the view of the Buddha’s body

original: skyes bur lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang / shed can tu lta ba rab tu spang bo dang / shed bdag tu lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang / byed pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /🔽slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor du 'jug pa por @99a *//
analyzed: skyes bur lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang / shed can tu lta ba rab tu spang bo dang / shed bdag tu lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang / byed pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor du 'jug pa por @99a *//
translated: It is to abandon the view of a being. It is to abandon the view of an individual. It is to abandon the view of an owner. It is to abandon the view of a creator. It is to abandon the view of an instigator.

original: lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
analyzed: lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
translated: It is to abandon the view of an experiencer. It is to abandon the view of a feeler. It is to abandon the view of a knower. It is to abandon the view of a seer. It is to abandon the view of annihilation. It is to abandon the view of permanence.

original: yod par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skye mched du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /🔽rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
analyzed: yod par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skye mched du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
translated: It is to completely abandon the view of existence and the view of nonexistence. It is to completely abandon the view of the aggregates, the view of the elements, and the view of the sense sources.🔽It is to completely abandon the view of dependent origination, the view of the truths, the view of the perfections, and the view of emptiness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yang dag par spong bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dbang por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yang dag par spong bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dbang por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
translated: It is to completely abandon the view of the applications of mindfulness, the view of the right efforts, the view of the legs of miraculous power, the view of the faculties, and the view of the powers.

original: stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /🔽bsam gtan du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshad med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
analyzed: stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bsam gtan du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshad med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
translated: the view of the powers, the view of the branches of enlightenment, the view of the noble eightfold path, the view of the noble truths,🔽the view of the concentrations, the view of the immeasurables, the view of the formless absorptions, the view of the liberations,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / @99b smon pa med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / @99b smon pa med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
translated: the view of the successive absorptions, the view of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation, the view of the superknowledges,

original: ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mi 'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mi 'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
translated: It is to completely abandon the view of the correct and discerning awarenesses.🔽It is to completely abandon the view of great love.🔽It is to completely abandon the view of great compassion.🔽It is to completely abandon the view of the distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
analyzed: byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
translated: It is to completely abandon the view of bringing beings to maturity.🔽It is to completely abandon the view of purifying a buddha realm.🔽It is to completely abandon the view of awakening.🔽It is to completely abandon the view of buddhahood.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
translated: It is to completely abandon the view of the Dharma.

original: dge 'dun du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du /
analyzed: dge 'dun du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du /
translated: in order to abandon the view of the Buddha, in order to abandon the view of the Dharma, in order to abandon the view of the Saṅgha, in order to abandon the view of the training, in order to abandon the view of the past, in order to abandon the view of the future, in order to abandon the view of the present, in order to abandon the view of the wholesome, in order to abandon the view of the unwholesome, in order to abandon the view of the śrāvakas, in order to abandon the view of the pratyekabuddhas, in order to abandon the view of the buddhas, in order to abandon the view of the compounded, in order to abandon the view of the uncompounded, in order to abandon the view of nirvāṇa, and in order to abandon the view of the turning of the wheel of Dharma.

original: sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de //
analyzed: sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de //
translated: “They teach the Dharma to sentient beings, but they do so without apprehending anything.

original: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o //🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: For that reason they are called bodhisattva great beings.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti said to the venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / ci'i phyir na /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin / tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Why is it that bodhisattva great beings would have a view of form?🔽Why would they have a view of feeling?🔽Why would they have a view of perception?

original: 'du shes su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽@100a *// 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: 'du shes su lta bar 'gyur ba yin / @100a *// 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Why would they have a view of formation?

original: rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Why would they have a view of consciousness?

original: mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the eyes.

original: rna bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rna bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin / snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the ears.🔽They will view the nose.

original: lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the tongue.

original: lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the body.

original: yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the mind.

original: gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view forms.

original: sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yin / drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view sounds.🔽They will view smells.

original: ror lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: ror lta bar 'gyur ba yin / reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view tastes.🔽They will view textures.

original: chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽sna'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin / sna'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view ear consciousness.🔽They will view nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin / sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the composite of ear contact as a self.🔽They will view the composite of nose contact as a self.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the composite of tongue contact as a self.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the composite of body contact as a self.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the composite of mind contact as a self.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the feeling that arises from the composite of eye contact as a self.🔽They will view the feeling that arises from the composite of ear contact as a self.🔽They will view the feeling that arises from the composite of nose contact as a self.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i @100b rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i @100b rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the feeling that arises from the composite of tongue contact as a self.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the feeling that arises from the composite of body contact as a self.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the feeling that arises from the composite of mind contact as a self.

original: sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the earth element as a self.

original: chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the water element as a view.

original: me'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: me'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin / rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the fire element as a view.🔽They will view the wind element as a view.

original: nam mkha'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the space element as a view.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the consciousness element as a view.

original: ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view ignorance as a view.

original: 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view volitional factors as a view.

original: rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view consciousness as a view.

original: ming dang gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view name and form as a view.

original: skye mched drug du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: skye mched drug du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the six sense fields as a view.

original: reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view contact as a view.

original: tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽sred par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin / sred par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view feeling as a view.🔽They will view craving as a view.

original: len par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: len par lta bar 'gyur ba yin / srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view grasping as a view.🔽They will view becoming as a view.

original: skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view birth as a view.

original: rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view old age and death as a view.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the perfection of generosity as a view.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline;🔽they will view the transcendent perfection of tolerance;

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the transcendent perfection of perseverance;

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the transcendent perfection of meditative stability;

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the transcendent perfection of wisdom;

original: nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin / phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view inner emptiness;🔽they will view outer emptiness;

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view inner and outer emptiness;

original: @101a *// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: @101a *// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the emptiness of emptiness;

original: chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view great emptiness;

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the emptiness of ultimate reality;🔽they will view the emptiness of conditioned phenomena;

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena;

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the emptiness of what is beyond extremes as a view.🔽They will view the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless as a view.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the emptiness of what is not to be discarded as a view.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the emptiness of inherent natures as a view.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the emptiness of all phenomena as a view.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the emptiness of defining characteristics as a view.🔽They will view the emptiness of non-apprehension as a view.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the emptiness of non-entities as a view.🔽They will view the emptiness of essential natures as a view.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin / dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities as a view.🔽They will view the applications of mindfulness as a view.

original: yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the correct exertions as a view.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the bases of supernatural powers as a self,

original: dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the faculties as a self,

original: stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the powers as a self,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the branches of awakening as a self,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the noble eightfold path as a self,

original: 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the noble truths as a self,

original: bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the concentrations as a self,

original: tshad med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: tshad med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the immeasurables as a self,

original: gzugs @101b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: gzugs @101b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the formless absorptions as a self,

original: rnam par thar par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the deliverances as a self,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to deliverance as a self,

original: mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the higher knowledges as a self,

original: ting nge 'dzin du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will view the meditative stabilities as a self,

original: gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the powers of the thus-gone ones.

original: mi 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽byams pa chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin / byams pa chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the correct understandings.🔽They will view great love.

original: snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin /

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the unique qualities of the buddhas.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /

original: byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin /

original: sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /

original: chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /

original: dge 'dun du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: dge 'dun du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the turning of the wheel of Dharma.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the parinirvāṇa.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: here bodhisattva great beings

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: with unskilled means apprehend form and give rise to views in the manner of apprehending.

original: tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta @102a *//🔽ba skyed do //
analyzed: tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta @102a *// ba skyed do //
translated: They apprehend feeling and give rise to views in the manner of apprehending.

original: 'du shes su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: 'du shes su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They apprehend perception and give rise to views in the manner of apprehending.

original: 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They apprehend volitional factors and give rise to views in the manner of apprehending.

original: rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽mig tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽rna bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // mig tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // rna bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They apprehend consciousness and give rise to views in the manner of apprehending.🔽They apprehend the eyes and give rise to views in the manner of apprehending.🔽They apprehend the ears and give rise to views in the manner of apprehending.

original: snar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: snar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They apprehend the nose and give rise to views in the manner of apprehending.

original: lcer dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: lcer dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing the tongue, and by observing in the manner of an object.

original: lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing the body, and by observing in the manner of an object.

original: yid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: yid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing the mind, and by observing in the manner of an object.

original: gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing form, and by observing in the manner of an object.

original: sgrar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽drir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽ror dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: sgrar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // drir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // ror dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing sound, and by observing in the manner of an object.🔽They generate the view by observing smell, and by observing in the manner of an object.🔽They generate the view by observing taste, and by observing in the manner of an object.

original: reg tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: reg tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing touch, and by observing in the manner of an object.

original: chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing mental objects, and by observing in the manner of an object.🔽They generate the view by observing eye consciousness, and by observing in the manner of an object.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing ear consciousness, and by observing in the manner of an object.

original: sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the nose consciousness and objectifying in the manner of an object.

original: lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs @102b pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs @102b pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the tongue consciousness and objectifying in the manner of an object.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the body consciousness and objectifying in the manner of an object.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the mind consciousness and objectifying in the manner of an object.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying eye contact and objectifying in the manner of an object.🔽They generate the view by objectifying ear contact and objectifying in the manner of an object.🔽They generate the view by objectifying nose contact and objectifying in the manner of an object.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying tongue contact and objectifying in the manner of an object.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying body contact and objectifying in the manner of an object.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the mind-contact as a focus, and so they give rise to views in a manner that objectifies things.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the feeling that arises from the condition of eye-contact as a focus, and so they give rise to views in a manner that objectifies things.🔽They view the feeling that arises from the condition of ear-contact as a focus, and so they give rise to views in a manner that objectifies things.🔽They view the feeling that arises from the condition of nose-contact as a focus, and so they give rise to views in a manner that objectifies things.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue-contact as a focus, and so they give rise to views in a manner that objectifies things.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the feeling that arises from the condition of body-contact as a focus, and so they give rise to views in a manner that objectifies things.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the feeling that arises from the condition of mind-contact as a focus, and so they give rise to views in a manner that objectifies things.

original: sa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: sa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing the earth element in the manner of observing.

original: @103a *// chu'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: @103a *// chu'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing the water element in the manner of observing.

original: me'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽rlung gi khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: me'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // rlung gi khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing the fire element in the manner of observing.🔽They generate the view by observing the wind element in the manner of observing.

original: nam mkha'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing the space element in the manner of observing.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing the consciousness element in the manner of observing.

original: ma rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: ma rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing ignorance in the manner of observing.

original: 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing volitions in the manner of observing.

original: rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing consciousness in the manner of observing.

original: ming dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by observing name and form in the manner of observing.

original: skye mched drug tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: skye mched drug tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: One generates the view by objectifying the six sense-spheres, by objectifying in the manner of objectification.

original: reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: One generates the view by objectifying contact, by objectifying in the manner of objectification.

original: tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: One generates the view by objectifying feeling, by objectifying in the manner of objectification.

original: sred par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽len par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: sred par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // len par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: One generates the view by objectifying craving, by objectifying in the manner of objectification.🔽One generates the view by objectifying grasping, by objectifying in the manner of objectification.

original: srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: One generates the view by objectifying becoming, by objectifying in the manner of objectification.

original: skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: One generates the view by objectifying birth, by objectifying in the manner of objectification.

original: rga shir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: rga shir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: One generates the view by objectifying old age and death, by objectifying in the manner of objectification.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: One generates the view by objectifying the perfection of giving, by objectifying in the manner of objectification.

original: tshul khrims kyi @103b pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi @103b pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: One generates the view by objectifying the perfection of morality, by objectifying in the manner of objectification.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view that the perfection of patience is an objective fact.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view that the perfection of perseverance is an objective fact.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view that the perfection of concentration is an objective fact.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view that the perfection of wisdom is an objective fact.🔽They generate the view that inner emptiness is an objective fact.

original: phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view that outer emptiness is an objective fact.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view that inner and outer emptiness is an objective fact.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view that the emptiness of emptiness is an objective fact.

original: chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of the great and, on account of that apprehension, they give rise to views.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of the ultimate and, on account of that apprehension, they give rise to views.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of the conditioned and, on account of that apprehension, they give rise to views.🔽They apprehend the emptiness of the unconditioned and, on account of that apprehension, they give rise to views.🔽They apprehend the emptiness of what is beyond extremes and, on account of that apprehension, they give rise to views.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽rang bzhin @104a *//
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // rang bzhin @104a *//
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of what is neither with nor without end and, on account of that apprehension, they give rise to views.

original: stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of non-rejection and, on account of that apprehension, they give rise to views.🔽They apprehend the emptiness of nature and, on account of that apprehension, they give rise to views.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view all phenomena as emptiness, and so give rise to views in a manner of objectification.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the emptiness of defining characteristics, and so give rise to views in a manner of objectification.🔽They view the emptiness of non-observation, and so give rise to views in a manner of objectification.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the emptiness of non-entities, and so give rise to views in a manner of objectification.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the emptiness of essential nature, and so give rise to views in a manner of objectification.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // dran pa nye bar bzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, and so give rise to views in a manner of objectification.🔽They view the applications of mindfulness, and so give rise to views in a manner of objectification.

original: yang dag par spong bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the correct abandonings, and so give rise to views in a manner of objectification.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the bases of supernatural powers, and so on, in the manner of objectification.

original: dbang por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: dbang por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the faculties, and so on, in the manner of objectification.

original: stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the powers, and so on, in the manner of objectification.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the branches of enlightenment, and so on, in the manner of objectification.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the eightfold noble path, and so on, in the manner of objectification.

original: 'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the truths, and so on, in the manner of objectification.

original: bsam gtan du dmigs @104b shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan du dmigs @104b shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the meditative stabilizations, and so on, in the manner of objectification.

original: tshad med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: tshad med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the immeasurables, and so on, in the manner of objectification.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the formless meditative stabilizations, and so on, in the manner of objectification.

original: rnam par thar par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: rnam par thar par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the liberations, producing views in a manner that objectifies them.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the nine serial absorptions, producing views in a manner that objectifies them.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation, producing views in a manner that objectifies them.

original: mngon par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: mngon par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the [forms of] clairvoyance, producing views in a manner that objectifies them.

original: ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the meditative stabilities, producing views in a manner that objectifies them.

original: gzungs kyi sgor dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgor dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the dhāraṇī gateways, producing views in a manner that objectifies them.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the powers of the tathāgatas, producing views in a manner that objectifies them.

original: mi 'jigs par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They view the fearlessnesses, producing views in a manner that objectifies them.

original: so so yang dag par rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽byams pa chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // byams pa chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the analytical knowledges and by objectifying the way of objectification.🔽They generate the view by objectifying the great love and by objectifying the way of objectification.

original: snying rje chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: snying rje chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the great compassion and by objectifying the way of objectification.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽sems can yongs su smin par bya bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul @105a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // sems can yongs su smin par bya bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul @105a *//
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the special qualities of the Buddha and by objectifying the way of objectification.

original: gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the maturation of sentient beings and by objectifying the way of objectification.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the purification of the buddhaverse and by objectifying the way of objectification.

original: byang chub tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: byang chub tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying awakening and by objectifying the way of objectification.

original: sangs rgyas su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying buddhahood and by objectifying the way of objectification.

original: chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view by objectifying the Dharma and by objectifying the way of objectification.

original: dge 'dun du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: dge 'dun du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: and the Saṅgha, and in the same vein, they generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are permanent.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are impermanent.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //
translated: They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are both permanent and impermanent.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are neither permanent nor impermanent.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are painful.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do //🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do // tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are pleasurable.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are neither painful nor pleasurable.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are empty.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are not empty.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are both empty and not empty.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are neither empty nor not empty.

original: tshor bar lta ba dang / 'du shes su lta ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽de'i phyir mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: tshor bar lta ba dang / 'du shes su lta ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin / de'i phyir mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are self.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are not self.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are both self and not self.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are neither self nor not self.

original: rna bar lta ba dang / snar lta ba dang / lcer lta ba dang / lus su lta ba dang / yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rna bar lta ba dang / snar lta ba dang / lcer lta ba dang / lus su lta ba dang / yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are pure.

original: de'i phyir gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are impure.🔽They generate the view that is based on the notion that the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha are both pure and impure.

original: sgrar lta ba dang / drir lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang / reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sgrar lta ba dang / drir lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang / reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental phenomena as the self.

original: de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view the eye consciousness as the self.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam @105b par shes par lta ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam @105b par shes par lta ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousnesses as the self.

original: de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view eye contact as the self.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact as the self.

original: de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact as the self.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyan gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyan gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang /
translated: It is to view the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact between body and touch as a view.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact between mind and mental phenomena as a view.

original: de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view the earth element as a view.

original: chu'i khams su lta ba dang / me'i khams su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: chu'i khams su lta ba dang / me'i khams su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element as a view.

original: de'i phyir ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view ignorance as a view.

original: 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs su lta ba dang / skye mched drug tu lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar lta ba dang / sred par lta ba dang /
analyzed: 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs su lta ba dang / skye mched drug tu lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar lta ba dang / sred par lta ba dang /
translated: They will view the constituents of consciousness, the constituents of name and form, the six sense sources, contact, sensation, craving,

original: len par lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang / skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: len par lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang / skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: grasping, becoming, birth, and aging and death as real.

original: de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur @106a *//
analyzed: de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur @106a *//
translated: They will view the perfection of generosity as real,

original: ba yin / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang /
analyzed: ba yin / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang /
translated: they will view the perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom as real.

original: de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the emptiness of internal phenomena as real,

original: phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
translated: the view of external emptiness, the view of the emptiness of both external and internal, the view of the emptiness of emptiness, the view of great emptiness, the view of the emptiness of the ultimate,🔽the view of the emptiness of the conditioned, the view of the emptiness of the unconditioned, the view of the emptiness of beyond extremes, the view of the emptiness of no beginning or end, the view of the emptiness of nonrejection,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
translated: the view of the emptiness of inherent existence, the view of the emptiness of all phenomena, the view of the emptiness of its own mark, the view of the emptiness of nonapprehension, the view of the emptiness of nonthings,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: It is to view the emptiness of essential nature and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: de'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Therefore, it is to view the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang por lta ba dang / stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba @106b dang / lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang por lta ba dang / stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba @106b dang / lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: to view the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the path.

original: de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Therefore, it is to view the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan du lta ba dang / tshad med par lta ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar bar lta ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
