original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the absence of attributes, the absence of aspirations, the superknowledges, the absorptions, and the dhāraṇī gateways as something to be viewed.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the powers of the thus-gone ones as something to be viewed.

original: mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the fearlessnesses, the correct understandings, great love, great compassion, and the unique qualities of the buddhas as something to be viewed.

original: de'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: They will view the ripening of beings as something to be viewed.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang /
translated: They will view the purification of buddha realms, awakening, buddhahood, the Dharma, the Saṅgha, and the turning of the wheel of Dharma as something to be viewed.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: They will have the view of complete nirvāṇa.🔽In this regard,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: the bodhisattva great beings

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to //
translated: through skillful means teach the Dharma by way of nonapprehending in order to abandon those views.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor @107a *//
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor @107a *//
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti

original: gyis / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: gyis / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: addressed the following words to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽don gang gi slad du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / don gang gi slad du /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽I am inspired to speak about the meaning

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o //
translated: of why one is called a bodhisattva great being.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /
analyzed: rab 'byor / khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /
translated: “Su­bhūti, you should speak with inspiration.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: ” Su­bhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas /
translated: “Bodhisattva” is a term for the mind that is equal to the unequaled, the mind that is not shared in common with all the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o //
analyzed: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o //
translated: “Mahāsattva” is a term for the mind that is not attached to that kind of mind.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste /
translated: Why is that?🔽It is because that mind of omniscience is not defiled and is not included.

original: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la'ang /
analyzed: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la'ang /
translated: That mind of omniscience, which is not defiled and is not included in the three realms,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas /
translated: is also not attached to because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o //
analyzed: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called a bodhisattva mahāsattva.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: He said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams @107b cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams @107b cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin /
translated: what is the bodhisattva great beings’ unequalled mind, the mind that is not shared in common with all the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad /
translated: here, from the time when bodhisattva great beings first give rise to the mind

original: chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: they do not see any dharma that arises,

original: 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: they do not see any dharma that ceases, increases, or decreases, comes or goes, is defiled or purified.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang la skye ba med cing /
analyzed: gang la skye ba med cing /
translated: where there is no arising

original: 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med do //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med do //
translated: It is not a śrāvaka thought,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do //🔽byang chub kyi sems med do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do // byang chub kyi sems med do //
translated: it is not a pratyekabuddha thought,

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'di ni /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'di ni /
translated: it is not a thought of perfect buddhahood,🔽it is not a thought of the level of the śrāvakas,🔽it is not a thought of the level of the pratyekabuddhas,🔽and it is not a thought of the level of the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra, this is the bodhisattva great beings’ thought that is equal to the unequaled,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so //
translated: the thought that is not shared in common with all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du /
translated: ” He said, “Venerable Subhūti, you have said,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa /
translated: ‘The thought of omniscience is uncontaminated,

original: khongs su chud pa med pa /
analyzed: khongs su chud pa med pa /
translated: it is not included,

original: de lta bu'i sems la'ang chags pa med do /
analyzed: de lta bu'i sems la'ang chags pa med do /
translated: and there is no attachment to such a thought.

original: zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te /
analyzed: zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te /
translated: The Venerable Subhūti said, “That is so, Śāriputra.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de bas na gzugs kyang chags pa med do //🔽tshor ba'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: de bas na gzugs kyang chags pa med do // tshor ba'ang chags pa med do //
translated: therefore form is not attached.🔽Feeling is not attached.

original: @108a *// 'du shes kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: @108a *// 'du shes kyang chags pa med do //
translated: Perception is not attached.

original: 'du byed kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyang chags pa med do //
translated: Disposition is not attached.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: Consciousness is not attached.

original: mig kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The eyes are not attached.

original: rna ba'ang chags pa med do //🔽sna'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'ang chags pa med do // sna'ang chags pa med do //
translated: The ears are not attached.🔽The nose is not attached.

original: lce'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'ang chags pa med do //
translated: The tongue is not attached.

original: lus kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The body is not attached.

original: yid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The mind is not attached.

original: gzugs kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyang chags pa med do //
translated: Form is not attached.

original: sgra'ang chags pa med do //🔽dri'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: sgra'ang chags pa med do // dri'ang chags pa med do //
translated: Sound is not attached.🔽Smell is not attached.

original: ro'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: ro'ang chags pa med do //
translated: Taste is not attached.

original: reg kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: reg kyang chags pa med do //
translated: Touch is not attached.

original: chos kyang chags pa med do //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos kyang chags pa med do // mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: Phenomena are not attached.🔽Eye consciousness is not attached.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: Ear consciousness is not attached.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: the nose consciousness is not bound and not freed,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: the tongue consciousness is not bound and not freed,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: the body consciousness is not bound and not freed,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: and the mind consciousness is not bound and not freed.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: “Eye contact is not bound and not freed,🔽ear contact is not bound and not freed,🔽nose contact is not bound and not freed,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: tongue contact is not bound and not freed,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: body contact is not bound and not freed,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: and mind contact is not bound and not freed.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do //
translated: “Feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is not bound and not freed,🔽feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is not bound and not freed,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @108b ba'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @108b ba'ang chags pa med do //

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //

translated: The emptiness of nature is also not attached.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
